entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Grande Rivière Airport 03:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -9.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 97.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -11.3°C
Wind: E 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
